cause.description:
For all of you out there that know a true leader when you see one. We support the nomination of Eric Barrier ,with Vice President Rakim Allah, to the Democratic ticket. In addition, we strive for the election and inauguration of Eric B to President in the 2008 Presidential Election.
1. Eric Barrier is the man and would bring about positive change for the country.
2. The refraining of or stopping of sweating the technique.
3. Getting paid in full.
cause.mission: Get Eric B elected President of the United States and
cause.name: Eric B For President
